messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

White House says President Barack Obama has been briefed about a masked man who took hostages at a cinema in western Germany. White House spokesman Eric Schultz says U.S. officials are in contact with their German counterparts.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The measure, spearheaded by Susan Collins, cleared one procedural hurdle. It was not clear if the Senate would move further ahead on it. Passing the bill in the House of Representatives could also be an uphill battle.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate was also expected to hold a similar vote on a more conservative Republican measure. It was not clear what the result of the two votes would be.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Senate Democratic leader Harry Reid throws his weight behind legislation. Legislation would stop gun sales to people on some terrorism watch lists. Reid: "Even though it may be a small step forward, at least it is a step forward"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Republicans move to force an end to the Democratic sit-in over gun control legislation. Republican lawmakers said House leaders wanted to file legislation on Zika funding. Lawmakers also said a vote was likely on legislation involving a rule submitted by the Department of Labor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House panned new Republican legislation to put $1.1 billion toward fighting the Zika virus. The plan was much less than the $ 1.9 billion requested by President Barack Obama. This plan from Congressional Republicans is four months late, the White House said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Democratic leader Harry Reid said an agreement announced on Wednesday by House of Representatives Republicans on $1.1 billion in new funding was not a serious response to the threat. A narrowly partisan proposal that cuts off womens access to birth control, shortchanges veterans and rescinds Obamacare funds to cover the cost, Reid said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said a sit-in by Democratic representatives aimed at pushing for a vote on gun control legislation was a publicity stunt. They know that we will not bring a bill that takes away a persons constitutionally guaranteed rights without ... due process, Ryan said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Pentagon: Harris Corp awarded $1.7 billion firm-fixed-price, multi-year foreign military sales contract. Contract to supply Afghanistan with Harris radios, ancillaries, spare parts and services.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Bernie Sanders says he will likely speak at the Democratic National Convention in July. He says he does not think he will be the partys nominee for the Nov. 8 election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi says sit-in will continue until gun control bill brought to floor. "We are in for the long haul here," Pelosi says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Sen. Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts will campaign with presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton in Ohio. Warren is an influential progressive within the Democratic Party.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Floridas Republican lieutenant governor, Carlos Lopez-Cantera, drops his bid for a U.S. Senate seat. Senator Marco Rubio said he would be entering the race. "I want to congratulate and thank Marco for his decision to pursue re-election," Lopez- cantera said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senator Marco Rubio said he was running for re-election in part to provide a counter-weight to whomever might win the White House in November. Rubio criticized Clinton in a statement he released to explain his decision.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell says he plans to bring a compromise gun control measure to a vote. Compromise measure being worked on by Republican Senator Susan Collins. Collins says a vote on her measure could come this week or next.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump has hired several new staff members to expand his campaign for the November election. Jim Murphy as national political director to focus on key battleground states, his campaign said on Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump says he is willing to tap into his personal funds to cover any fundraising deficit. Republican presidential candidate finished May more than $40 million behind Hillary Clinton in cash.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Senators Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts and Tim Kaine of Virginia, and Julian Castro, the U.S. housing secretary, are on the short list of vice presidential picks. Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont, who waged a populist challenge to Clinton during an unexpectedly long primary campaign, was not on the list, the AP reported.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton will meet with fellow Democrats in the House of Representatives on Wednesday. Meeting in Congress will be Clintons first meeting with Democrats in House since becoming presumptive nominee earlier this month.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate fell 13 votes short of clearing the measure for approval. The chamber also defeated three other gun control measures stemming from the June 12 shootings.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate fell seven votes short of clearing the way for approving the measure. The Senate is now set to vote on a more sweeping Democratic proposal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Senate fell 16 votes short of the 60 needed for advancing the measure. The measure would have closed a background check loophole. The Senate is now set to vote on two other gun control measures.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The FBI planned a 11:00 a.m. news conference near the Pulse nightclub in Orlando, Florida. Authorities planned to release transcripts of communications between police and gunman Omar Mateen.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senate seeking to prevent sale of firearms to potential terrorists. Vote likely to be held on Tuesday, Senator Dianne Feinstein says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate will most likely vote on four gun control measures on Monday. Two of the proposals are sponsored by Democrats and two by Republicans. Vote comes after weekend shooting massacre at a gay nightclub in Florida.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Sen. Dianne Feinstein said she doubted talks with the Senates No. 2 Republican, John Cornyn, would succeed. She also said she understood that Cornyn had shared her draft legislation with the National Rifle Association.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton says she would use executive action to end a tax loophole for wealthy Americans. Clinton said that if Congress did not act, she would ask the Treasury Department to end the tax advantage. The loophole allows hedge-fund managers to pay a lower rate than other taxpayers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Michelle Obama will travel to Liberia, Morocco and Spain at the end of June. She will visit a Peace Corps training center in Kakata and a school in Unification Town. Obama will be joined by actor Meryl Streep in Morocco on June 28 and 29.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The gun lobbying group said it welcomed a meeting with Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump. It said sales to potential buyers who are on the lists should be delayed while they are investigated.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Rep. Adam Schiff says Russian targeting should be expected. He would not elaborate on reports that Russia was involved in hacking the DNC database.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Venezuela and the U.S. will immediately start talks to ease tensions, Kerry says. Venezuela is embroiled in an economic and political crisis that has led to social unrest. The United States will send Under Secretary of State for Political Affairs Thomas Shannon.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kremlin spokesman: "I completely rule out a possibility that the (Russian) government or the government bodies have been involved in this" U.S. sources say hackers gained access to all opposition research on Donald Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said the Senate would take up a bill dealing with Puerto Ricos debt. Backers of the House-passed bill are hoping the Senate signs off on the legislation before July 1. Puerto Rico faces a deadline on a $1.9 billion debt payment.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan said a Muslim ban is not in the nations interest. Ryan said people entering the country should face a robust security test but not a religious test.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry calls on Venezuela to release political prisoners. Kerry spoke at a meeting of the Organization of American States in the Dominican Republic.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump says the U.S. needs to increase its military response against Islamic State. The presumptive Republican nominee said that he would address acts of terrorism in his speech.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump says he thinks Orlando nightclub shooter Omar Mateen was known to people in the Muslim community. Trump says the U.S. needs better intelligence-gathering to prevent such things from happening. "We have to look at the mosques," Trump says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama will deliver a statement to the press on Tuesday morning. It will follow a meeting of his National Security Council on the attack in Orlando, Florida.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Barack Obama will travel to Orlando, Florida, on Thursday. Obama will pay respects to families of the victims of the shooting at a nightclub.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Orlando gay nightclub shooter Omar Mateen made two trips to Saudi Arabia in 2011 and 2012, MSNBC reported. MSNBC said officials did not know what Mateen was doing in Saudi Arabia or whether he met with anyone while there.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry warns Americans against pointing a finger at one religion or another. The worst thing we can do is engage in trying to point fingers at one group or one form of sectarianism or another, Kerry says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump will go ahead with a major speech at St. Anselms College in Portsmouth. Trump will hold a rally in the city in the near future, his campaign says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan: "We are a nation at war with Islamist terrorists" Ryan also said he had ordered flags above the Capitol to be flown at half-staff.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Dick Durbin: Congress must take a stand against hate, terrorism, and gun violence. The bottom line is that we allow dangerous people to buy guns in America, he says. We have the power to act, and we must, he adds.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump says he predicted attacks on American soil by terrorists. Trump reiterates his call for a ban on foreign-born Muslims entering country.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump calls on President Barack Obama to resign from office. Trump: "I am trying to save lives and prevent the next terrorist attack. We cant afford to be politically correct anymore"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Democratic U.S. presidential candidate Hillary Clinton calls the shooting an act of terror. Clinton: "To the LGBT community: please know that you have millions of allies"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Mitt Romney says he will not run for president in 2016. Romney has led a movement to derail Donald Trump's nomination.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The AFL-CIO political committee on Friday recommended the federation endorse Hillary Clinton for president. The site reports the general board is certain to approve the endorsement at their June 16 meeting.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senator Elizabeth Warren endorsed presumptive Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton. Warren: "I am ready to get in this fight and work my heart out"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Senator Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts will endorse fellow Democrat Hillary Clinton. Warren will declare her support on MSNBCs The Rachel Maddow Show on Thursday night.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House said that Senator Bernie Sanders was not surprised by the nod of support. The president has had the opportunity to speak to Senator Sanders three times in the last week.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Vice President Joe Biden will meet with Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders. Sanders met earlier on Thursday with President Barack Obama, who later endorsed Hillary Clinton.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama formally endorsed fellow Democrat Hillary Clinton. Obama and Clinton were rivals during the 2008 Democratic primary that Obama won. Clinton went on to serve as Obamas secretary of state during his first term.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Clinton and Obama will begin campaigning together next week in Green Bay, Wisconsin. Clinton: It is absolutely a joy and an honor that President Obama and I have gone from fierce competitors to true friends.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bernie Sanders says he will meet with rival Hillary Clinton soon to discuss ways to defeat Donald Trump. Sanders praised Obama and Biden for not thumbing the scales by endorsing a candidate during the primary season.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House says it supports legislation aimed at helping Puerto Rico dig out of its $70 billion debt crisis. The bill is set for a vote in the U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday. Obama administration does oppose provisions in the bill on minimum wage and overtime.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House of Representatives Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi says she feels pretty good about the prospect for passage of a bill to address Puerto Rican financial crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton says she will deliver an economic agenda address soon. Clinton: Its not hard to see how a Trump presidency could lead to a serious global economic crisis.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says he was surprised by criticism. Trump made comments about the Mexican heritage of a federal judge. Trump: "I had just won more votes than anyone in the history of the party"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says he has narrowed his search for a vice presidential running mate down to four or five unnamed establishment politicians. Trump said of not announcing his choice until the Republican National Convention in July.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Rep. Bill Flores of Texas said he could not back Republican Donald Trump for president. Flores said he was incredibly angry about comments that the presumptive Republican presidential nominee made about U.S. District Judge Gonzalo Curiel.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Environmental activist Tom Steyer endorses Hillary Clinton for U.S. president. Clinton is an experienced leader who will lead us to victory, Steyer says. Now is the time to come together to defeat Donald Trump, he says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Barack Obama calls former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton. Obama congratulates her on securing the delegates needed to become Democratic presidential nominee. Obama also spoke to Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump says his comments questioning the impartiality of a Mexican-American judge had been misconstrued. Trump said it was fair to question the judges impartiality in the civil suit against Trump University.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell says Donald Trump should stop attacking minority groups. McConnell: "Its time to quit attacking various people that you competed with"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton strongly opposes a proposal unveiled by a Republican congressman to roll back Dodd-Frank financial reforms. Clinton adviser Gary Gensler said the proposal from Representative Jeb Hensarling was ill-conceived.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan disavowed Donald Trumps criticism of a Hispanic judge. Ryan said such remarks were the textbook definition of a racist comment.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi endorsed Hillary Clinton for the presidency on Tuesday. Pelosi called on supporters of rival Bernie Sanders to advance our shared fight.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton has reached the number of delegates needed to clinch the Democratic presidential nomination. Clinton has 1,812 pledged delegates won in primaries and caucuses. She also has the support of 571 superdelegates, according to an Associated Press count.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama will travel to Poland and Spain next month. Obama will attend his last NATO summit in Warsaw from July 7 to July 9. He then travels to meet with leaders in Spain, a NATO ally, from July 9 to July 11.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Everytown for Gun Safety praised Clinton for siding with the public. Group was founded by billionaire and former New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. has approved 4,700 Syrian refugees who are awaiting resettlement. An additional 7,900 are awaiting security review, Jeh Johnson says. Johnson defends against critics who say the Obama administration is falling behind.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says he will reopen Trump University. Trump is fighting a lawsuit against the venture that accuses the school of misleading thousands of people.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Bryan Pagliano is believed to have set up and maintained Hillary Clintons private email server. He will assert his Fifth Amendment rights against self-incrimination and refuse to answer questions as part of an open records lawsuit.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Barack Obama will host Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong at the White House for an official visit and state dinner on Aug. 2.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton says her campaign has been in contact with the campaign of rival Bernie Sanders. Unifying the party will be a central challenge once Democrats choose their nominee. Clinton heavily favored to win the nomination but facing a protracted battle with Sanders.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Conservative commentator Bill Kristol is considering choosing David French to run as an independent presidential candidate. Kristol, editor of the Weekly Standard, has expressed disappointment that Trump has likely secured the Republican nomination.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. plans to use upcoming talks with top Chinese officials to discuss ways to bring greater pressure to bear on North Korea. The outcome that were looking for is North Korean agreement to negotiate the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, Assistant Secretary of State Daniel Russel said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. urges Pyongyang to refrain from actions that create tensions in northeastern Asia. North Korea attempted to launch an intermediate-range ballistic missile on Monday. White House spokesman: The United States strongly condemns North Koreas missile test.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic presidential candidate Bernie Sanders expressed disappointment on Friday. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he would not debate Sanders. Sanders: "I hope that he changes his mind again"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Judge Emmet Sullivan granted the request of lawyers for Clintons ex-chief of staff. Cheryl Mills had worried that video clips of her interview could be used for political purposes. Sullivan went further, ordering all videotaped depositions to remain sealed.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan says he had a good conversation with presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump. Ryan had no comment on his possible endorsement of the partys likely nominee.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton won the contest by 1,911 votes, Kentucky Secretary of State Alison Grimes said on Thursday. Clinton's rival for the partys nomination, Senator Bernie Sanders, had requested a recount in the razor-close contest.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan and likely Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump are to speak by telephone. This is not an endorsement call, spokesman Zack Roday said. Ryan continues to withhold his support from Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Top U.S. State Department officials were aware of Hillary Clintons use of private email as secretary of state. Spokesman Mark Toner said the State Department has already complied with many recommendations in an inspector generals report.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

State Department inspector generals report shows Hillary Clintons email practices reflected those of other secretaries of state. Report shows problems with the State Departments electronic recordkeeping systems were longstanding.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Marcel Lazar, who used the alias Guccifer, entered his guilty plea. Sentencing was set for Sept. 1. Lazar claimed he had easily hacked into Clintons controversial private email server.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Santorum dropped out of the presidential race in February and threw his support to Senator Marco Rubio. Last Wednesday, Trump unveiled a list of 11 judges he would consider, if elected.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Terry McAuliffe, Virginias Democratic governor, said on Tuesday said he was confident that a person at the center of an FBI investigation over contributions to his 2013 campaign was a legitimate donor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Nguyen Quang A said he was forced into a car by a group of police officers. He was driven out of the capital, and kept away for 5-1/2 hours. Obama later said several people had been prevented from meeting him.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama said several civil society members in Vietnam were prevented from meeting him. Obama said there were significant areas of concern about political freedom. Obama announced on Monday the end of an arms ban on Vietnam.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama said he was confident a Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) trade deal he has championed will be approved. Obama, on a Visit to Vietnam, told a news conference the TPP was a good deal. He said he had not seen a credible argument that the deal, which will group 12 economies, would hurt U.N.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The NRA is the countrys leading gun-rights advocacy group. Trump, his partys presumptive nominee for the Nov. 8 election, praised the NRA.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
CNN's Jake Tapper cites campaign spokeswoman Hope Hicks. Donald Trump is the presumptive Republican nominee for U.S. president.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic presidential front-runner Hillary Clinton says Republican candidate Donald Trump is unqualified to be president of the United States. "I have concluded that he is not qualified," Clinton said in an interview on CNN.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump says if elected he would most likely choose a U.S. Supreme Court justice. Trump: "At a minimum we will keep people within this general realm" Trump is the presumptive Republican presidential nominee.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican and Democratic members of the U.S. House of Representatives introduce a resolution reaffirming American support for NATO. Trump has said the 67-year-old alliance is obsolete and costs the United States too much. The resolution was backed by two Republicans and 18 Democrats.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Hillary Clinton releases her personal financial disclosure form covering Jan. 1, 2015, to the present. She calls on Republican Donald Trump to make available his income tax returns. Trump earlier in the day announced that he had filed his personal disclosure to the Federal Election Commission.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Aide to U.S. Democrat Hillary Clinton criticized Donald Trumps foreign policy as making no sense. Republican presidential candidate said he would hold talks with North Koreas Kim Jong Un.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton criticized Republican Donald Trumps proposal to dismantle the Dodd-Frank financial reform law. Trump, in an interview with Reuters on Tuesday, called the 2010 law a very negative force.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Donald Trump has filed a new personal financial disclosure form. The form details a net worth of more than $10 billion. Trump has refused so far to release his income tax statements. That decision has drawn criticism from likely Democratic rival Hillary Clinton.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House says the House bill is woefully inadequate to support the public health response. The Obama administration has urged Congress to pass legislation to fight the virus.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The bill would allow survivors and relatives of those killed in the Sept. 11 attacks to sue to seek damages from the government of Saudi Arabia. Given the concerns that we have expressed, its difficult to imagine the president signing this legislation, White House spokesman says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The U.S. presidential campaign is not a subject of discussion at the Federal Reserves policy meetings, Atlanta Fed President Dennis Lockhart says. Lockhart told an audience at an event on economic policy in Washington.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The meeting in New York comes after weeks of telephone conversations between Trump and Kissinger. Kissinger was a top adviser to Presidents Richard Nixon and Gerald Ford.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House confirmed on Monday that Ben Rhodes, the deputy national security adviser, would not testify at a House oversight panel on Iran on Tuesday. The panel had asked Rhodes to appear after a New York Times article had suggested that he had manipulated the public debate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew urges China to implement economic reforms. Lew calls on Bejing to liberalize its investment environment, reduce excess industrial capacity in its metals sector.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump said Britain leaving the EU would make no difference to a potential bilateral trade deal if he became president. President Barack Obama told Britons that if they elected to leave the EU in a June 23 referendum they would be at the back of the queue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Barack Obama said he and leaders from five Nordic nations agreed on the need to maintain sanctions against Russia. Obama said the countries were united in their concern about Russias aggressive military presence in the Nordic region.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Five Nordic countries and the U.S. call on Russia to ensure its military maneuvers are in compliance with international obligations. Leaders of Denmark and Norway also said in the statement they are prepared to join the United States.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said on Friday an updated bill dealing with Puerto Ricos debt will be introduced in the coming days. Ryan: "There will be no taxpayer bailout of Puerto Rico"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says he and U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan largely agree on issues. Trump and Ryan held a highly anticipated meeting in Washington on Thursday to try to bridge differences.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump says Amazon.com has a huge antitrust problem. Trump also said Amazon Chief Executive Jeff Bezos, who owns the Washington Post, is using the newspaper to influence politicians in Washington.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Japan and the U.S. are preparing to hold a summit meeting around May 25. Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and President Barack Obama will likely meet. They are expected to discuss issues such as the global economy.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said he had a very, very good meeting with Paul Ryan. The two men met to try to patch up differences on policy proposals and the tone of his insurgent campaign.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House said it would welcome any progress made by the U.S. Congress toward striking a deal. A Senate proposal for $1.1 billion in emergency funds is under consideration.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The meetings marked an effort within the Republican Party to unify following a contentious primary battle for the Republican presidential nomination.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. lawmakers are making progress toward legislation to address Puerto Ricos financial crisis. Lawmakers could produce a bill as early as Thursday, the top House Democrat said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senator Orrin Hatch of Utah, one of the Senates most senior Republicans, said on Thursday that he was endorsing presumptive presidential nominee Donald Trump. "I totally endorse him," Hatch said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
